tp.pr4.items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.items.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeCard, Fuel, Garbage

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Carmen Acosta Morales y Nerea Ramirez Lamela The superclass of every type of item. It contains the common information for all the items and it defines the interface that the items must match
